vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Marco Sorto of two tracts of land containing approximately 10,579 square feet, improved with a single-family residence, located on Alex Street near its intersection with Childers Street for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $74,040.00 ($71,040.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
